More about me

Hi, I'm Selen. Nice to meet you.

An enthusiastic self-taught with a strong desire to learn and contribute to innovative web projects. I'm quietly confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving myself. Since decided to begin my journey as a self-learner, I enrolled courses and I developed 3 different user-friendly and responsive projects. I keep going to learn more and implement more project!

My interest in web developing and design helps me find creative solutions to technical challenges and develop visually beautifully websites. In addition, my technical knowledges are accumulating day by day, and I am keep loving what I do.

Frontend Developer

I like to code things from scratch and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser.
